attributes.action: Crack down on knife crime in the capital
attributes.additional_details: Now 6 stabbings in one week in the Capital
attributes.background:
Clearly this is out of hand, knife crime in London, someone cant walk innocently down the road anymore.
Teenagers can no longer go out without  fearing for their lives everytime they step outside. 
We need something done, tougher crime sentencing!

rejection.details:
The Mayor of London is responsible for the Metropolitan Police.

You can find out how to petition the Greater London Assembly, which looks at the work of the Mayor, here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to provide more funding to the Metropolitan Police if that is something you would like to see happen.

You might also like to sign these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233926
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231568
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232326
